about_the_game:
Join Sadie and become part of a unique experience through the wonders of the golden age of Hollywood. Inspired by the genre classics, this is a puzzle-platforming adventure that sets you in a intriguing slapstick story about Sadie's efforts to become an actress while facing intriguing challenges, including her own family's legacy. With a unique dynamic music system that adapts to Sadie's actions, it ensures an authentic silent movie experience.

Sadie grew up as the one next to youngest kid in a large vaudeville family called “The Flaming Cascadeurs”. Sadie is the perfect acrobat. Millimetric accuracy. Can shoot a gun, arrow, throw a knife bullseye, every time, even when her eyes are tied.

She’s elastic, fits in tight spots. She can become “invisible” as you won’t hear her coming. She’s a natural martial & fire artist. Heightened sense of smell. She’s fast as a bullet. Great with a car, even greater with a monocycle, or even a horse. She’s a Spiderwoman, avant la lettre.

This is also an invitation to take part of a varied polished gameplay experience that has everything you have ever wanted from a puzzle-platformer, filled with humor and visual gags.

From hiding and stealth to puzzles and fast-paced platforming sequences, feel it all while travelling through the movie studios and vivid streets of Hollywood.

Jump, Swing, Slide & Glide - Platform your way and avoid obstacles in your adventure to find Sadie's destiny and help her escape the past.

Stealth, Hide & Run - Use your wit to hide and avoid the goons of the prohibition as you follow the movies, the glitz and the glamour of Hollywood

Challenging Platforming - Try again, and don't lose your wit. The movies won't make themselves. Help Sadie achieve the perfect stunt, the perfect scene and become famous!

Sadie’s Ma and Pa have big plans for her. Sadie will be the one to take the family business to the next level. And once she marries Cedric Bulow, of the great Bulow Circus family (the biggest Circus family in the state), an entertainment empire will be born.

The Flaming Cascadeurs will conquer the United States. But Sadie has other plans. She wants to become an actress.

Wander deep into Sadie's adventure while having a laugh through visual gags that will surely transport you in time, reminding you of Charlie Chaplin's and Buster Keaton's great comedy silent movies, just to name a few.

Uncover the misteries - There is something fishy behind this movie studio's front. The mob and its complex operations are getting in the way, and Sadie is getting in the way as well. Find out what is going on and how can you stop it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 8600K or AMD 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 11600K or AMD 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dive into Silent Sadie, a puzzle-platformer in Hollywood's golden age. Join Sadie on her quest to become a star, tackling puzzles, stealth challenges, and fast-paced platforming. Inspired by silent film legends, this game combines humor, visual gags, and challenging gameplay in a charming adventure.
